All times are reported in Universal Coordinated time (UTC), please see Program overview for conversions into your local time.

item.title: Abstract submission now open!
item.description: Abstract submissions for oral presentations are now open, see here for details.
item.content:encoded:
We are pleased to announce that abstract submissions are now open for oral presentations for CampyUK goes global 2021.

Please register and submit your abstract for consideration by the organisers using this link: https://forms.gle/6ek3b6s6TRQHiyLw5
